Name: CORGIX
About the game: Follow Corgix story on more than 14 levels and play the Online mode. The game consist on cutting through a masks layer and revealing the image below. There is a simple story with more than 14 levels and the Online and Offline modes are available immediately. Play the whole story to unlock the bosses for the Online and Offline modes. The game has a few power ups that will randomly appear on the map or the enemies themselves. Enclose those things you want to get. And do not let anyone to touch your line. The Online mode allows to search internet for images for endless gaming. Requests have to be simple and without spelling errors, some words might fail... try another one. The Offline mode let you pick a folder from your own computer and play with the local image files.
